00000000000000000010010000111100
00000000000000000000000000000110 : MOVE #%110,D1	# D2 <- 110
00000000000000000010001000111100
00000000000000000000000000000001 : MOVE #%1,D2		# D1 <- 1 
00000000000000001101010000000001  : ADD D2,D1		# D2 <- 1+110=111
00000000000000000010000001000001 : MOVE D1,A0 		# A0 <- 1
00000000000000000010001001111100
00000000000000000000000000000011 : MOVE #%11,A1		# A1 <- 11
00000000000000001101001010010000  : ADD (A0),(A1)	# Mem(A1) <- Mem(A0) + Mem(A1) = 111

# Test increment and decrement

#  : MOVE (A0),A1 					# A1 <- Mem(A0) = 110
#Register Mode Mode register
#Destiny		Source
